page.title: 02LIFE IN 1985
page.content:
Life In 1985
Weekdays I get up at about 7.00.a.m,wash,clean my teeth and go downstairs.Breakfast consists of a cereal,Bran Flakes,Fruit and Fibre,Corn Flakes or Weetabix.I might watch morning T.V. Then I pick up my sandwich box and when my friends call for me we set off for school. At 9.00am school starts-during the day we do maths,English P.E, art,own topic and general subjects.There is a break at 10.30 and we finish for dinner at 12.00.School begins again at 1.30 and ends at 3.30.After school we might play rounders,football,netball, badminton,cricket,gymnastics or cross country and some children play music. Everybody learns to swim.At night I watch T.V.for a while-sometimes when I'm in bed.
